alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dale County through 915 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ozark, moving east at 25 mph. At 821 PM CDT, the Loew Army Heliport station measured a wind gust of 32 mph. HAZARD...Winds in up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Ozark, Fort Novosel, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Grimes, Napier Field, Sylvan Grove, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dean Church Road, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Bagwells Crossroads, Kelly, Ewell, Browns Crossroads, Goldberg Field and Hanchey Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
